Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is slightly grooved and covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of five lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Wangstedt 1976-1977 / Demotische Ostraca Varia I (pp.17-18 no. 8.)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (51758) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/51758)
Almásy-Martin 2020 / Demotic, Greek and Coptic ostraca from Abydos in the British Museum (no.10)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.BM Abydos Dem. 10 (Edition abbreviation according to Oates et al. 2001)
